name: Daddy Dino Rocks
description:
Make a lover's dream come true - pave his way to his beloved's heart by solving the puzzles!

GAMEPLAY
Group similar stones in order to clear each of the 150 levels. Pure logic and creative thinking will be employed to solve these twisted challenges.

STORY
The dinosaur in love wants to express his feelings to his beloved through the precious stones he's collecting. All he needs to do is connect them with a thread of love into a gorgeous necklace as a present for her. This will determine their future as told in the Dino Rocks game. Will their dreams come true? It depends on you!

CREATE AND PLAY
The fun doesn't stop when the story ends, you can create your very own levels. Your imagination is the limit, what wonders can you create?

Features:

- 150 unique levels
- Easy and intuitive gameplay
- Beautifully detailed backgrounds and Retina optimized graphics
- Game Center integration
- Create your own levels and share them

Follow us on Twitter: @sungiftgames

Thanks for playing and enjoy!
